name: Warlords Awakening Early Access Package
detailed_description:
The Warlords Awakening Early Access Package is for players who have already purchased and started playing Warlords Awakening and feel like adding some special Early Access exclusive content to their game. The package includes the following content:

  • Exclusive Black Dragon Pet
  • Exclusive Black Ninja Costume
  • Exclusive Early Access "First Born" Title
  • In-game Mint Shouts x 20
  • Social "Group Dance" Emote x 5
  • Magic Appearance Change Ticket x 3
  • HP/MP Recovery Flask (50%) - 60 Min x 20
  • Stat Option Change Scroll [Unique] x 50
  • Skill Option Change Scroll [Unique] x 50

Note: Purchase of this package by itself does not grant you access to the game
about_the_game:

short_description: The Warlords Awakening Early Access Package is for players who have already purchased and started playing Warlords Awakening and feel like adding some special Early Access exclusive content to their game. The package includes an Early Access exclusive pet and costume, as well as some other consumable added benefits.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows XP
  • Процессор: Dual Core 2.0Ghz
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: GeForce 9500GT
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 12 GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 10
  • Процессор: i3
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: GeForce GTS 450
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 12 GB
